snippet.title: Cats and the Other Lives - First Trailer
snippet.description:
We present to you the very first trailer of “Cats and the Other Lives”, our latest game.

“Cats and the Other Lives” is a narrative experience that explores the reunion of a broken family from the perspective of their house cat, Aspen.

As the cat, players will touch the hopes, disappointments and regrets of the enigmatic Mason family, traversing through a rich narrative that spans over decades.

Check out our Steam page and social media for news on development and more!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1360390/Cats_and_the_Other_Lives/
